Leo Vue

Leo Vue is a web app that can display files created with Leo, the open source outlining editor and IDE.

Leo has features that make it particularly suitable for documenting code and other complex documents.

Using Leo, you can create an outlined website or document like the one you are viewing. Content nodes can contain text, html, markdown or code. Content nodes can also point to other documents or websites.

Leo Vue was created using Vue.js, so you can add Vue.js components to your outline's content.
